https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2MzPzzKTeAfdDQlRqQecNYWspB1.jpg Alessandro Corso is a special forces carabiniere. During an operation he saves a child but cause the death of one of his comrades. He's then transferred to a peaceful little town, where he will be unexpectedly forced to help an hot witness named Antavleva, protecting her and bringing them safely to the trial. Alex l'ariete
